title: MAUVE Accessibility Validator
creator: Human Interfaces in Information Systems Laboratory - ISTI-CNR
description: MAUVE is an environment for Web accessibility evaluation. Accessibility guidelines can be defined and updated through an XML-based definition language without requiring changes in the tool implementation. It checks both HTML and CSS and, through some browsers’ plugins, it can validate dynamic sites.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
